tool_description: Installs hardware drivers from downloaded driver packages or Windows Update, manages driver conflicts, and ensures proper hardware functionality after OS installation.

driver_source.description: Source for driver installation: local_package, windows_update, or manufacturer_site

driver_package_path.description: Path to local driver package if using local_package source

installation_order.description: Preferred order for driver installation categories

force_install.description: Whether to force installation of unsigned drivers

create_restore_point.description: Whether to create system restore point before driver installation

error_messages: Invalid driver source: Use one of [local_package, windows_update, manufacturer_site].
Driver package not found: Local driver package path does not exist or is not accessible.
Driver installation failed: Unable to install one or more drivers.
Driver conflict detected: New driver conflicts with existing system drivers.
Unsigned driver blocked: System policy prevents installation of unsigned drivers.
Restore point creation failed: Unable to create system restore point before driver installation.
usage: Choose driver_source based on available drivers (local_package for pre-downloaded drivers, windows_update for automatic detection). Follow installation_order for optimal compatibility. Enable create_restore_point for safety.

installation_failures.description: List of drivers that failed to install

hardware_functional.description: List of hardware components now functioning properly

reboot_required.description: Whether system restart is required to complete driver installation

restore_point_id.description: System restore point identifier created before installation
